input.sentences: my buddy and i invited family and friends to our place for dinner and games .
my best friend | [male] | munching on some good grub | his girlfriend [female] is beside him | my sister | [female] | is in the background .
[male] and his girl freida finished eating and both said they were too full to move and they have to digest some before playing any games .
[male] | laughing at a joke that i told that really was n't funny at all | he had a mouth full of food and almost choked on it . lol .
my aunt [female] ate too much then passed out in my chair | she was very hard to rouse from her napping | only to eat more !
output.sentences: Jim and Joe were ready to party
Some friends came and ate up all their food.
During a party game joe got to sit with a hottie lisa.
another guy kept laughing at the hottie's jokes but she wasn't into it.
Joe's jealous friend kept grabbing more food when Joe really just wanted to be alone with Lisa.
